title: Lakefront villas in Koggala
details:
This versatile lakefront property is on the north shore of Koggala Lake in an enviable position with breathtaking views and abundant wildlife.

There are two villas on the plot, the first a two-bedroomed recently renovated antique villa with lake views and a swimming pool, the second a new-build one-bedroomed house with serene views across paddy fields.
